system.description: This evil spell allows you to create more powerful undead: ghouls (11th or lower), ghasts (12th–14th), mummies (15th–17th), and mohrgs (18th+). You may create less powerful undead than your level would allow. Created undead are not automatically under your control; if you can command undead, you may attempt to command the creature as it forms. This spell must be cast at night.

components.materialDescription: Clay pot of grave dirt, clay pot of brackish water. Place a black onyx gem worth at least 50 gp per HD of the undead in the corpse's mouth or eye socket (consumed).
